original_text: Do not drink too much wine so that you become drunk. That will destroy your life. Instead, let God's Spirit fill you.
korean_text: 술 취하지 말라 이는 방탕한 것이니 오직 성령으로 충만함을 받으라

sentences.original_text: Do not drink too much wine
Instead, let God's Spirit fill you
sentences.korean_translation: 대신, 하나님의 영이 너를 채우게 하라
